lines: 1. Yesu ma ni malowinj alamwa ka,Ka wakulore nyimi,Ka wapakoi.
2. Kata In Ruodh polo,Ng`a maler chutho,To imor kiwinjoWende nyithindi.
3. Podi wan nyithindo,Waonge teko;Yesu, wuothi kodwa,Kwaluwo yori.
4. Igeng`wa e temruok,Iritwa pile;Ket hera e chunywa,Golnwa kethrukwa.
5. Chieng` Yesu koluongowaWanayie gi mor;"Ee, Ruodhwa wabiro,Wanadhi kodi."
